name: SquareBoy
description:
SquareBoy has died and gone to hell!

As punishment for his gluttony in life, he is doomed to eat bricks in a maze for all eternity.

Avoid the devils, consume the bricks, and wander the almost-ever-growing maze.

SquareBoy was originally made (and unfinished) for Mini Jam 69, with the themes "hell" and "cards."
